text: Bramans is a former commune. It is in Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes in the Savoie department in southeast France. On 1 January 2017, it was merged into the new commune of Val-Cenis.Arrêté préfectoral 8 August 2016 == Twin towns == Bramans is twinned with: * Giaglione, Italy, since 2010 == References == Category:Former communes in France Category:Communes in Savoie
title: Bramans
